patthana16.95:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.95:4.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.95:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.95:7.1: Sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.95:8.1: Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte nava, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.95:9.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
